Class Bank

java.lang.Object
Bank
public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
Represents the bank and controls top level actions. This class can identify what a player needs to do based on the property the player lands on, and in addition, it controls how many players are added into the game.
Version:
May 26, 2021
Author:
rohit
